TopicTitle: Operation Cygnus: A Voyage to Duna (ongoing)

Articles.Content:
"This... is Duna. For years this planet has PLAGUED the... well, plagued probably isn't fair- yeah okay, plagued. We'll go with plagued. This planet has PLAGUED the Kerbal Space Program. Being, y'know, all red and white and having a big stupid moon. But no longer! No longer will this be the case! For today marks the beginning for Operation Cygnus. A plan so cunning... it's... too cunning to describe. I don't know. This is a stupid introduction."

~Shadowbulb, at the announcement of Operation Cygnus.

Duna's a menace. Look at it, with its huge stupid moon and its huge stupid polar ice caps. What does it think it is, Antarctica? We can't have this. It's not fair. It's not right. You don't see Jool having a huge polar ice cap! You don't see Eve having a huge stupid moon! Something must be done about this. For justice. Sadly, due to budget cuts we're unable to do anything about it, so we'll have to settle for a huge awesome exploration mission to Duna in a huge awesome ship. These things happen, no need to cry about it.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=B3uV-LktpDY - The Cygnus is assembled while unnecessarily dramatic music plays.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjqO7yjPrEc - Duncan and Lodton arrive at the Cygnus while I show how awful I am at pretty much everything, like docking and humour.

There's more coming soon, but I hope you enjoy what I have so far!

Shadowbulb 518.
New episode! Operation Cygnus part 3! The Cygnus finally sets sail for Duna, accompanied by graphical glitches, illness and fake anger. www.youtube.com/watch?v=vIYV1gNnJyo
I know it's been a couple of weeks but here's part 4. The two bravest Kerbals to ever live land on the planet Duna. www.youtube.com/watch?v=bXURiCVzX6Q
Part 5: The second-bravest Kerbals in history begin the exploration of Ike. www.youtube.com/watch?v=QPj0L3zGeGs
Part 6: The exploration of Ike. www.youtube.com/watch?v=yrAr_H5C-p0
